data.message: If only there were more multi billion companies that shared the same passion for innovation and equality like you guys. This world would be a far better place.

replies.message: Thanks for the kind words, Brian! -Azaria
Facebook THANK-YOU....ID BE LOST WITHOUT YOU!AND THIS WORLD (((IS))) A BETTER PLACE BECAUSE OF YOUR HELP !....
Absolutly,..connecting the world on plane at a time. These people are Amazing!

Such ambition couldn't be prouder to be a member if the Facebook family. You made my world a better place.i have more family for all I lost and friends I would if never found without you. Thanks a million
please dont thank him, just make sure the company never looses focus
Absolutely making sure there's no privacy at all. This is a government plane and opp. FB is the patsy.

I had to scroll for ten mins just to find one comment that wasn't saying how great Facebook is. Wake up people. One in ten people don't have access to clean water and one in three don't have access to sanitation. Facebook has the money to make real change in this world but choose not to. Please stop being blind sheep and open your eyes.
When is this available. #remote location. What is the cost.
